hibernate-mapping.query: select new trscrolwithoutReverdto ( vw.ENO, vw.CRPARTICULAR, vw.CR_CURRENT, vw.CR_SAVING, vw.CR_CALL, vw.CR_FIXED, vw.CR_DOMESTIC, vw.DRPARTICULAR, vw.DR_CURRENT, vw.DR_SAVING, vw.DR_CALL, vw.DR_FIXED, vw.DR_DOMESTIC ) from MNMVIW00008 as vw where vw.WORKSTATION=:workstation and vw.SOURCECUR=:sourcecur and convert(char(10),vw.DATE_TIME,112)=convert(char(10),:TDatetime,112)

select new trscrolwithoutReverdto ( vw.ENO, vw.CRPARTICULAR, vw.CR_CURRENT, vw.CR_SAVING, vw.CR_CALL, vw.CR_FIXED, vw.CR_DOMESTIC, vw.DRPARTICULAR, vw.DR_CURRENT, vw.DR_SAVING, vw.DR_CALL, vw.DR_FIXED, vw.DR_DOMESTIC ) from MNMVIW00008 as vw where vw.WORKSTATION=:workstation and vw.SOURCEBR=:sourcebr and vw.SOURCECUR=:sourcecur and convert(char(10),vw.DATE_TIME,112)=convert(char(10),:TDatetime,112)

select new trscrolwithoutReverdto ( vw.ENO, vw.CRPARTICULAR, vw.CR_CURRENT, vw.CR_SAVING, vw.CR_CALL, vw.CR_FIXED, vw.CR_DOMESTIC, vw.DRPARTICULAR, vw.DR_CURRENT, vw.DR_SAVING, vw.DR_CALL, vw.DR_FIXED, vw.DR_DOMESTIC ) from MNMVIW00008 as vw where vw.WORKSTATION=:workstation and vw.SOURCECUR=:sourcecur and convert(char(10),vw.SETTLEMENTDATE,112)=convert(char(10),:SDatetime,112)

select new trscrolwithoutReverdto ( vw.ENO, vw.CRPARTICULAR, vw.CR_CURRENT, vw.CR_SAVING, vw.CR_CALL, vw.CR_FIXED, vw.CR_DOMESTIC, vw.DRPARTICULAR, vw.DR_CURRENT, vw.DR_SAVING, vw.DR_CALL, vw.DR_FIXED, vw.DR_DOMESTIC ) from MNMVIW00008 as vw where vw.WORKSTATION=:workstation and vw.SOURCEBR=:sourcebr and vw.SOURCECUR=:sourcecur and convert(char(10),vw.SETTLEMENTDATE,112)=convert(char(10),:SDatetime,112)
